title: Assassins Creed: Odyssey (PS4)
description: First released in 2007, assassin’s creed is an award-winning video game series that has had multiple spin-offs; The series has been released amongst nearly all consoles including previous generations and is one of the biggest in the gaming industry

Assassin’s creed has followed the story of the secret war that seems to be never-ending; The assassin brotherhood and the Templar order have been fighting in many different historical settings from around the world
No more details have been released and ubisoft have promised to reveal more information at E3 2018; Tune back in for further information and pre-order assassin’s creed: odyssey today

title: Elton PS4 Controller Dualshock 4 Vinyl Decal- American Flag
category: Elton PS4 Controller Dualshock 4 Vinyl Decal- American Flag
description: PRECISION CUT - Elton skins preciously fit PlayStation 4 Controller (Controllers not included), it is easy install and removal, not leave behind residue on your dualshock 4 remote controllers decalsELTON skin is created using two ingredients: quality materials and precision cuts. Everyone knows that 3M is the global leader in premium vinyl – that’s why we use only 3M vinyl. It’s the same vinyl that’s used to wrap Lambos, so you can trust that it’s good enough for your gaming console. .
GOOD PROTECTION - Elton skins vinyl decals will prevent your Sony Play Station 4 remote controllers from dust proof, waterproof, oil proof and fingerprints.
TOP QUALITY - Full Color, "Anti-Slip" Grip-Like Vinyl System Protective "Sticker". Custom PS4 controller skins will not Scratch, Fade (UV Resistant) or Peel.

Installation - To install: 1. Clean PS4 accessories surface thoroughly 2. Put on each piece of vinyl decal carefully 3. Apply hot air to PS4 remote play decal surface for a best result by using a hair dryer or hot air gun.

We use satin Matte or Gloss Finish Overlaminate on all our Controller Skins which further increase print life. of the product along with making it water-proof.,Anti -Glare & Anti-UV.Laminate also increases thickness of skin making it tougher against scratches and other wear & tear compared to skins without lamination.
